default.$description: Default border color. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

subtle.$description: Subtle border color for minimal separation. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

strong.$description: Strong border color for emphasized separation. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

inverse.$description: Inverse border color for use on dark backgrounds. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.
